1.0.1.name: connect20/MageWorkshop_DPI
1.0.1.description: This extension displays attribute values of the product on Product Page and various product lists (Category Page, Tagged Products, Search and Advanced search).

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
